Easy.Q: If there are 1 cat and 2 dogs, how many animals are there?
If there are 2 cows and 3 chickens, how many animals are there?
If there are 4 rabbits and 1 turtle, how many animals are there?
If there are 3 birds and 2 fish, how many animals are there?
If there are 5 horses and 0 sheep, how many animals are there?
If there are 6 ducks and 1 goose, how many animals are there?
If there are 2 pigs and 4 goats, how many animals are there?
If there are 7 frogs and 2 lizards, how many animals are there?
If there are 8 squirrels and 1 rabbit, how many animals are there?
If there are 3 foxes and 5 raccoons, how many animals are there?
If there are 4 wolves and 2 bears, how many animals are there?
If there are 1 elephant and 1 tiger, how many animals are there?
If there are 9 monkeys and 0 zebras, how many animals are there?
If there are 0 kangaroos and 3 koalas, how many animals are there?
If there are 5 penguins and 4 seals, how many animals are there?

Medium.Q: If there are 10 lions and 15 deer, how many animals are there?

If there are 15 geese and 10 swans, how many animals are there?
If there are 14 owls and 11 bats, how many animals are there?
If there are 13 parrots and 12 squirrels, how many animals are there?
If there are 10 turtles and 20 rabbits, how many animals are there?
If there are 18 cats and 7 dogs, how many animals are there?
If there are 19 donkeys and 6 elephants, how many animals are there?
If there are 20 lions and 5 giraffes, how many animals are there?
If there are 21 snakes and 4 frogs, how many animals are there?
If there are 22 zebras and 3 bears, how many animals are there?
If there are 23 dolphins and 2 whales, how many animals are there?

Hard.Q: If there are 100 chickens and 200 cows, how many animals are there?

If there are 125 dolphins and 375 sharks, how many animals are there?
If there are 300 penguins and 400 seals, how many animals are there?

If there are 500 fish and 500 turtles, how many animals are there?
If there are 450 goats and 550 sheep, how many animals are there?
If there are 600 ducks and 400 geese, how many animals are there?
If there are 800 horses and 200 zebras, how many animals are there?
If there are 900 kangaroos and 100 koalas, how many animals are there?
If there are 750 lizards and 250 snakes, how many animals are there?
If there are 1000 ants and 1000 spiders, how many animals are there?
If there are 1500 mice and 500 rats, how many animals are there?
If there are 1200 bees and 800 butterflies, how many animals are there?
If there are 1750 crabs and 250 lobsters, how many animals are there?
